title: Why is the Gifting option unavailable?
body:
The gifting option is temporarily unavailable, but it's been like that for quite long now and with Elementalist Lux (which is superb by the way riot, thank you for creating) i want to gift this skin to my (sexy, beasty, beautiful, cute) girlfriend and make her happy lol
Any ways to fix this quicker please Riot 

Thank you very much
and also again, damn cool skin you guys made

replies.body:
Are you on the updated client?  Content gifting should be fine to use on the legacy client, but not available on the updated yet:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I'm sure she'll love it!

so I did what you suggested and riot took my RP for gifting Elementalist Lux to my girlfriend and took my RP for gifting Jinx and Wildfire Zyra Skin to my brother and neither one of them received their gift. i just bought 35$ so i could do this what am I supposed to do now?

The same thing just Happened to me. I went back to the legacy client to gift my friend Spirit fire Brand, but after the gifting process (It took my Rp) the gift was never received. Will I be able to get my Rp back? When gifting is available on the new client maybe the gift will send automatically? I guess I'll just have to wait it out.

> [{quoted}](name=Qrayonix,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tI9NImEH,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-04T20:17:02.326+0000)

Will I be able to get my Rp back? When gifting is available on the new client maybe the gift will send automatically? I guess I'll just have to wait it out.

Scratch that. Waiting did the trick, after a few hours the gift was received. Sorry if I scared you Riot :X

Oh i just realised that you can gift in the new client but reverting back to the old legacy client can. Simple go to the log in place and at the right hand side below the forgotten password link, you can see launch legacy client. Simply press that and you can gift all you want.

Thank you anyway but i found out the solution lol

take care all
If the gift recipient also logs in via legacy client, they should receive the gifts immediately.
